title: Harnessing lattice oxygens in a high-entropy perovskite oxide for enhanced oxygen evolution reaction
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE01204F, Paper
Sujan Sen, Tapas Kumar Mandal
Development of highly active and stable electrocatalysts for oxygen evolution reaction (OER) is the main challenge in water electrolysis for green hydrogen production. Although Ru-based electrocatalysts have been in use...
